articles.title: Mars Rover Begins Dropping Rock Samples for Future Return to Earth - VOA Learning English
articles.description: The American space agency NASA’s Mars explorer begins dropping rock samples it collected on the planet’s surface. The goal is for another spacecraft to recover the samples and send them to back to Earth.
